title: Local SEO - MozMoz logoMenu openMenu closeSearchMoz logo
description: Your all-in-one suite of SEO essentials.
content: By: George Freitag November 21, 2016 Announcing MozCon Local 2017! SEO Events | Local SEO | Moz News Get a sneak peek at the speakers (and get your early-bird tickets) for February 2017's #1 local marketing conference, MozCon Local! Read this post By: Tom Capper November 21, 2016 Competing for Local Queries With No Physical Premises On-page SEO | Local SEO If you don't have a physical presence, there are some situations where you can still rank for local queries. Learn whether you should, how to identify queries to compete for, and recommendations on how to optimize for them. Read this post By: Dudley Carr November 17, 2016 The New Moz Local: Make Local Your Advantage! Local SEO | Moz News Today we’re excited to share our latest updates to Moz Local. This release has something useful for everyone in local SEO — read on to see what's new! Read this post By: Miriam Ellis October 27, 2016 Local Empathy: The New Tool in Your Brand's Emergency Kit Local SEO | Reputation Management The way two brands reacted during Hurricane Matthew resulted in priceless positive media coverage for one, and a slew of one-star reviews for the other. Miriam Ellis shows how your local SEO strategy can go beyond your office walls to make your brand (and community) great. Read this post By: Miriam Ellis October 10, 2016 The Complete Guide to Creating On-Site Reviews + Testimonials Pages Local SEO Reviews are huge in the local SEO game, and they deserve a spotlight on your clients' site. Miriam Ellis is here to explain why and how you should create on-site review+testimonial pages ASAP. Read this post By: Dan Leibson September 22, 2016 Here’s How We’re Using Lean Startup Methodologies for Local SEO Local SEO Product and project management is a critical part of running/managing an SEO business (or any business based on SEO); it's also something that doesn't get discussed nearly as much in professional circles. For me, I care equally about how our internal process are working versus how our SEO services are performing, primarily because they can't be separated. If you internal processes suck,... Read this post By: Miriam Ellis September 12, 2016 Duplicate Listings and the Case of the Nomadic New Mexican Restaurant Local SEO | Moz Tools Even the softest, chewiest tortillas and most flavorful carne can't save you when customers are being misdirected to false locations via outdated, inconsistent, and duplicate listings. Read this post By: Miriam Ellis September 1, 2016 Using the Barnacle SEO Method to Prove Local Community Awareness Local SEO Barnacle SEO can be huge for increasing local brand awareness, whether you work with SMBs or enterprise businesses with many locations. Get granular with your strategy in this post detailing how you can latch on to those local opportunities. Read this post By: Rand Fishkin August 26, 2016 Why Every Website (Not Just Local Sites) Should Invest in Local Links and Citations Local SEO | Whiteboard Friday Have you been ignoring local link and citation building because you're an online-only or non-local website? In today's Whiteboard Friday, Rand explains why all sites should consider chasing local links and citations, suggesting a few different ways to discover opportunities in your areas of focus. Read this post By: George Freitag August 22, 2016 Making Sense of Google's Updates in Local Search Local SEO | Search Engines As Google rolls out change after change to local search, how can you be sure your strategy is heading in the right direction? Join the discussion online. Read this post By: Casey Meraz August 16, 2016 The State of Local SEO & Where to Focus Now Local SEO Google's ever-changing nature means that local search is constantly changing and evolving, too. Take a look at the current state of local SEO & what you should be doing to get (or stay) on top. Read this post By: Mark Preston August 15, 2016 Case Study: The Interconnectedness of Local SEO and Exact Match Domains Local SEO Is it possible that exact match domains and partial match domains are still given priority by Google? Read this post By: George Freitag August 9, 2016 Giving Duplicate Listing Management the Upgrade it Deserves Local SEO | Moz Tools | Moz News Duplicate listings have plagued local marketers for years. See how agencies, brands & SMBs alike can seek and destroy dupes faster than ever with Moz Local. Read this post By: Alexandra Tachalova August 4, 2016 A Different Kind of SEO: 5 Big Challenges One Niche Faces in Google Local SEO | Marketing Industry New research shows that online legal businesses are stealing an outrageous amount of web traffic from local companies, leaving them with little chance of ranking in local SERPs. Read this post
